video.title: The Sutra of Hui Neng (Wei Lang) Part 1 - 6th Patriarch of Zen - The Treasure of the Law
video.description:
Selected passages from the "Sutra Spoken by the Sixth Patriarch on the High Seat of the Treasure of the Law." Hui Neng (638-713) was a seminal figure in Buddhist history. He is the famous “Sixth Patriarch” of the Chan or meditation tradition, which is better known in Japanese as “Zen”.

Music: Language of Silence by Deuter
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UIPqADsyxJo

Please note: my recordings can be downloaded from my Google Drive site - details of links are provided under the COMMUNITY tab of the main page of my YT channel.
